about-us.first_section_description: We are a Swiss based nearshore DevOps-Center with five Location in Europe (Switzerland, Germany, Albania, Kosovo and Northan Macedonia). A combination of high-level technological skills and business processes knowledge located closed to our clients allowesus to provide our clients the the best-in class services around IT Nearshore Partnership.
about-us.third_section_description: Desc: We offer our customers the possibility to flexibly increase their current staff with the possibility to get quick access to our qualified and experienced personnel at any time, based on their planning, e.g. (SAFe) Pi Planning, for a 12-week Pi-Planning or for several PI-Planning’s.

third_section_second_item_list.6: • Agile Leadership (RTE, SM, PO) and Tech Leads
